title: Quark plug–ins
content:

comments.content: [Extensis](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423050938/http:/www.extensis.com/) used to have some useful extensions. It has been forever since I used them however.
You can bring up an align objects window in Quark by pressing Command-Comma.
